title: Default values are not shown in Show Report Parameters' dialog
OB: When accessing the 'Show Report Parameters' dialog in the software, the default values of the report parameters are not displayed.
EB: The 'Show Report Parameters' dialog should display the default values of the report parameters.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create several report parameters and set default values for them. 2. Drag the report parameters to the layout. 3. Access the 'Show Report Parameters' dialog.
